title: Peanut Butter Cookie Dough Bars
directions: In a large mixing bowl, beat softened butter with brown sugar until fully combined. Add vanilla and peanut butter, beat until fluffy. Add flour and sweetened condensed milk. Beat until everything is blended well. Fold in the mini chocolate chip morsels.
In a microwave safe, medium sized bowl, add peanut butter and chocolate chips for the frosting. Melt for one minute. Stir and spread over the cookie dough.
Refrigerate for 3 hours (or overnight). Cut into bite sized pieces. Store in a covered container for up to a week.
